name: redmyne
description: Personal workload management for Redmine - track your issues, log time, visualize capacity

commands.title: Redmine: List open issues assigned to me
Redmine: Actions for issue under cursor

viewsWelcome.contents:
No plan for today.
[Plan Your Day](command:redmine.timer.planDay)

---

**Tips:**
- Right-click units for more actions
- `Ctrl+Y T` toggles timer
- Click a unit to start/pause

No kanban tasks yet.
[Add Task](command:redmine.kanban.add)

---

**Tips:**
- Right-click tasks for actions
- Add tasks to Today's Plan
- Link tasks to Redmine issues

No Redmine configuration found.
[Configure Redmine](command:redmine.configure)
Set up your Redmine server URL and API key to get started.

redmine.url.markdownDescription:
**Redmine server URL (HTTPS required)**

 HTTP connections are not allowed for security.

**Storage:**
- URL: User settings (`settings.json`)
- API Key: Encrypted secrets (Windows Credential Manager / macOS Keychain / Linux libsecret)
- Both are global (single Redmine server)

redmine.apiKey.description: DEPRECATED: Use 'Redmine: Set API Key' command instead
redmine.apiKey.deprecationMessage: API keys now stored in VS Code secrets. Run 'Redmine: Set API Key'

redmine.logging.enabled.description: Enable API request/response logging to output channel

redmine.autoUpdateDoneRatio.description: Auto-update % Done based on spent/estimated hours when logging time. Caps at 99% (100% must be manual). Skips if over budget.

redmine.showCalculatedPriority.description: Show calculated priority score in Gantt tooltips (based on due date urgency, downstream dependencies, external blocks)

redmine.workingHours.hoursPerDay.markdownDescription:
**DEPRECATED:** Use `#redmine.workingHours.weeklySchedule#` instead.

Daily working hours for time entry calculations.
redmine.workingHours.hoursPerDay.deprecationMessage: Use redmine.workingHours.weeklySchedule to set hours per day of week

redmine.workingHours.workingDays.markdownDescription:
**DEPRECATED:** Use `#redmine.workingHours.weeklySchedule#` instead.

Working days for time entry calculations.
redmine.workingHours.workingDays.deprecationMessage: Use redmine.workingHours.weeklySchedule to set hours per day of week

redmine.workingHours.weeklySchedule.markdownDescription:
**Weekly working hours schedule**

Set working hours for each day of the week (0-24h). Use 0 for non-working days.

**Example schedules:**
- Standard 5-day week: Mon-Fri = 8h, Sat-Sun = 0h
- 4-day week: Mon-Thu = 10h, Fri-Sun = 0h
- Part-time Friday: Mon-Thu = 8h, Fri = 4h, Sat-Sun = 0h

Used to calculate utilization percentages in time entry view.

redmine.statusBar.showWorkload.markdownDescription:
**Show workload overview in status bar**

Displays remaining work and capacity buffer.

**Note:** Opt-in to reduce noise. Enable if you need capacity planning at a glance.

**Format:** `25h left, +8h buffer`

redmine.gantt.extendedRelationTypes.markdownDescription:
**Enable extended scheduling relation types**

Adds support for Gantt plugin dependency types:
- Finish-to-Start (FS)
- Start-to-Start (SS)
- Finish-to-Finish (FF)
- Start-to-Finish (SF)

Disable if your server doesn't have a Gantt plugin.

redmine.gantt.visibleRelationTypes.markdownDescription:
**Relation types to show as dependency arrows**

- `blocks` / `precedes`  Scheduling relations (default)
- `relates`  General association
- `duplicates`  Duplicate tracking
- `copied_to`  Copy history

Only scheduling types affect project planning.

redmine.maxConcurrentRequests.markdownDescription:
**Maximum concurrent API requests**

Limits how many requests run simultaneously to prevent server overload.

- **2** (default): Safe for most servers
- **5-10**: For faster servers
- **20**: Maximum, use if server handles high load

Reduce if you see 503 errors. Increase for faster data loading.

walkthroughs.title: Get Started with Redmyne
walkthroughs.description: Log time without leaving your IDE

steps.title: Connect to Redmine
steps.description:
One-time setup. Enter URL and API key.

[Configure](command:redmine.configure)

steps.title: Log Your First Entry
steps.description:
Try it: **Ctrl+Y Ctrl+Y**  pick issue  enter hours  done.

[Log Time Now](command:redmine.quickLogTime)

steps.title: Browse Your Issues
steps.description:
See what's assigned to you. Color = schedule risk.

[Open Sidebar](command:workbench.view.extension.redmine-explorer)

steps.title: Go Deeper
steps.description:
Gantt chart, Timer, Kanban  when you're ready.

[Open Gantt](command:redmine.showGantt)
